page.title: 02THE HOLMESCALES AREA
page.content:
{ Holmescales}is part of the{civil {parish}of{Old Hutton and Holmescales. {Ecclesiastically,}Holmescales is part of{the parish}of{St. John the Baptist, {Old Hutton.}However, it was for {centuries}an{outlying part}of the {parish}of{St. James, Burton in Kendal. The{landscape}is{undulating farmland rising to{hillier pastures}in the{east.}Dairy farming is {predominant,}although{sheep}are{fairly {common}on the{rougher grazing}land. The{M6}passes approximately {one mile}to the{east}of Holmescales.
